title: Play in EU West from Australia
body:
Hey guys!So I recently moved to Australia,and I had to move servers because my ping on EUW was 300 at its best with a fast internet connection.
I really miss playing with my friends,is there absolutely no way for me to play on EUW in Australia?{{champion:1}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

You can play on EUW from Australia, all you'll need to do is create a new EUW account and start playing :)

If you wish to transfer your account back to EUW you'll have to wait until November 21st as region transfers from OCE [are currently disabled](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/f6bvYNQx-important-notice-transfers-disabled-from-sep-14th-to-nov-21st).

Hey:)

I know about that,my issue is the ping from EUW in Australia,it doesnt get less than 300 :/
Unfortunately there is no way to solve this, short of moving to somewhere closer to EUW
